name: Wp Minimal Typography
author: Md Mahmudul Hasan

sections.description: Wp Minimal Typography is a custom header typography plagin, also it work for content typography. You will be able to set font size, font color, font weight, font style and text transform. just install and use it with comfortably.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

1. Go to your WordPress Dashboard -> Plugins -> Add New
2. Search for Wp Minimal Typography
3. Install & Activate Wp Minimal Typography from your Plugins page.
4. Go to your WordPress Dashboard -> Appearance -> Customize -> Wp Minimal Typography and set your value them click Published.
5. Visit your site and enjoy :)

From wordpress.org

1. Download Wp Minimal Typography
2. Upload the Wp Minimal Typography directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp etc…)
3. Activate Wp Minimal Typography from your Plugins page.
4. Go to your WordPress Dashboard -> Appearance -> Customize -> Wp Minimal Typography and set your value them click Published.
5. Visit your site and enjoy :)
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin ?

Go to your WordPress Dashboard -> Appearance -> Customize -> Wp Minimal Typography and set your value them click Published.

short_description: Wp Minimal Typography is for header custom style & content style.
